alert.note: Alert for Dyer; Gibson; Obion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 10 at 9:33AM CDT until further notice by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee... Obion River near Obion For the Obion River...including Obion...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Obion River near Obion. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 36.0 feet, Rives is flooding. Most cropland near the river is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 35.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 34.0 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
